title: Global industrial robot market : key companies by related revenue 2017
yAxis: Industrial robot revenue in million euros
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Industrial robot revenue in million euros for 6 number of Companiess.
The Industrial robot revenue in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Companies ABB and lowest at Companies KUKA.
There is a difference of 5619.0 between the maximum Companies ABB and minimum Companies KUKA.
